name: Buber - Drinking Games
description:
Get ready for a fun drinking night with your favorite games!

Drink 'till you're falling down with our handpicked card games!

Discover who is the most adventurous and experienced friend in your group with our ice breaker games ["Never Have I Ever", "Most Likely To", "Do or Drink", "Truth or Drink" (with over 800 questions/challenges!)]

Make the most of your night by adding fun and thrilling games available for all your friends! Only one phone is needed!

*Drink responsibly*

*Only drink if you're of legal age*

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*THIS IS AN APP WITH MULTIPLE DIFFERENT DRINKING GAMES.

 MY FRIENDS AND I DECIDED TO DO A FREE ONE BECAUSE ALL THE OTHER APPS WERE PAID OR WE FOUND THEM PRETTY UNDERWHELMING, WE WILL KEEP UPDATING IT FOR A WHILE*

If you have any suggestions on games we could add or things you'd like to see please please say so! Any constructive criticism is appreciated! (:

Thank you and have fun!
